channel.title: CVE Feed for IBM -- Jazz for Service Management
channel.description: The latest CVEs for IBM -- Jazz for Service Management

item.title: CVE-2021-29831|2024-08-03T22:18:03.154Z -- ibm -- jazz%20for%20service%20management
item.description: IBM Jazz for Service Management 1.1.3.10 and IBM Tivoli Netcool/OMNIbus_GUI is vulnerable to an XML External Entity Injection (XXE) attack when processing XML data. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to expose sensitive information or consume memory resources. IBM X-Force ID: 204775.

item.title: CVE-2021-29813|2024-08-03T22:18:03.135Z -- ibm -- jazz%20for%20service%20management
item.description: IBM Jazz for Service Management 1.1.3.10 and IBM Tivoli Netcool/OMNIbus_GUI is vulnerable to stored cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 204331.

item.title: CVE-2021-29800|2024-08-03T22:18:03.151Z -- ibm -- jazz%20for%20service%20management
item.description: IBM Tivoli Netcool/OMNIbus_GUI and IBM Jazz for Service Management 1.1.3.10 is vulnerable to stored cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session.

item.title: CVE-2021-29816|2024-08-03T22:18:02.963Z -- ibm -- jazz%20for%20service%20management
item.description: IBM Jazz for Service Management 1.1.3.10 and IBM Tivoli Netcool/OMNIbus_GUI is vulnerable to cross-site request forgery which could allow an attacker to execute malicious and unauthorized actions transmitted from a user that the website trusts. IBM X-Force ID: 204341.

item.title: CVE-2021-29904|2024-08-03T22:18:03.293Z -- ibm -- jazz%20for%20service%20management
item.description: IBM Jazz for Service Management 1.1.3.10 and IBM Tivoli Netcool/OMNIbus_GUI displays user credentials in plain clear text which can be read by a local user. IBM X-Force ID: 207610.

item.title: CVE-2023-46186|2024-08-02T20:37:40.006Z -- ibm -- jazz%20for%20service%20management
item.description: IBM Jazz for Service Management 1.1.3.20 could allow an unauthorized user to obtain sensitive file information using forced browsing due to improper access controls. IBM X-Force ID: 269929.
